definitions.definition: Written by hand in normal characters, as opposed to shorthand .
Written by hand (with pen or pencil), rather than printed out; handwritten .
examples: I had to write the essay out twice longhand – they wouldn’t let me print it out. It took forever!

main_definition: Written by hand in normal characters, as opposed to shorthand .
secondary_definitions: Written by hand (with pen or pencil), rather than printed out; handwritten .
